content: Sporting event delegation **Singapore** competed at the [1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games](/wiki/1958_British_Empire_and_Commonwealth_Games) in [Cardiff, Wales](/wiki/Cardiff,_Wales), for its first time at the [Commonwealth Games](/wiki/Commonwealth_Games). It was represented by three athletes, competing in two sports. It won two gold medals from weightlifting. ## Medalists MedalNameSportEvent Gold[Tan Ser Cher](/wiki/Tan_Ser_Cher)Weightlifting[60kg Combined](/wiki/1958_British_Empire_and_Commonwealth_Games#Weightlifting) Gold[Tan Howe Liang](/wiki/Tan_Howe_Liang)Weightlifting[67.5kg Combined](/wiki/1958_British_Empire_and_Commonwealth_Games#Weightlifting) ## Weightlifting [Tan Howe Liang](/wiki/Tan_Howe_Liang) broke the world record by lifting 347 pounds in the Clean & Jerk portion in the 67.5kg Combined weight event. title: Singapore at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
